title: Metronome
lyrics:
Pileul tago heuleuji chagaun mom-ui seongjil
Hanchi ochado eobsneun geuleon salam nain geol
Nal bichun tteugeoun bich amuleon soyong-eobsji
Muneotteulilyeomyeon jogeum-eun himdeul geol
I'm gonna live like this gangbagjeung-illeonji

But I like to live like this geudaeloleul malhaji



Cham dang-yeonhan geojanh-a eojjeogess-eo

Saneun ge ttoggatgess-eo chalali nadabgess-eo

Dalkomhan mallo dalwo mwo hagess-eo naneun dalla

Eoneusae nae gil-eul geodneun na



Na gat-eun salam I live like a metronome

Ttoggat-eun sigan nan daleuge sal-a

Na gat-eun salam I live like a metronome

I live I live like like like like a metronome

I live I live like like like like



I soliga deullini nae an-ui sigye chochim

Jan-inhal mankeum-ina kal gat-eun geol



I'm gonna live like this gangbagjeung-illeonji

But I like to live like this geudaeloleul malhaji



Cham dang-yeonhan geojanh-a eojjeogess-eo

Saneun ge ttoggatgess-eo chalali nadabgess-eo

Dalkomhan mallo dalwo mwo hagess-eo

Naneun dalla eoneusae nae gil-eul geodneun na



Na gat-eun salam I live like a metronome

Ttoggat-eun sigan nan daleuge sal-a

Na gat-eun salam I live like a metronome

I live I live like like like like a metronome

I live I live like like like like



Nan mom-ui ban-eung-i daleun geol gamhi nal bakkul sun eobs-eo

Yeah because I love it

Yeah because I love it

Yeah because I love it



Na gat-eun salam I live like a metronome

Ttoggat-eun sigan nan daleuge sal-a

Na gat-eun salam I live like a metronome



I live I live like like like like a metronome

I live I live like like like like metronome I live

Na gat-eun salam I live like a metronome
